patthana20.3:1.1: Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:2.1: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:3.1: Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:5.1: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ca anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.3:6.1: Naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.3:7.1: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:8.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.3:9.1: Naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:10.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:11.1: Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:12.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.3:13.1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:15.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.3:16.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
